title: The Guilt and Fellowship Offerings
summary: Leviticus 7 outlines the laws for guilt and fellowship offerings, including which parts belong to the priests. It also gives further instructions about handling sacred food and the importance of ritual cleanliness.

faq.question: Can anyone eat the fellowship offering?
faq.answer: Yes, but only those who are ceremonially clean may eat it.

faq.question: What was the priestâ€™s portion?
faq.answer: The breast and thigh of fellowship offerings, plus parts of other sacrifices.
